name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs
description:
OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs is an puzzel game with cool dinosaurs in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces.
Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

features:

  • 12 Levels
  • very difficult puzzle adventure
  • auto saving
  • simple mouse control
  • 100 steam awards
